# Linear Model
```{r}
mod1 <- lm(Three$DFC_CLA~Three$AvgKeto20_atleast10)
summary(mod1)
plot(mod1)

# Log transformation
Three.log <- Three %>%
  mutate(log.DFC_CLA = log(DFC_CLA),
         log.DFCFirstHeat = log(DFCFirstHeat))
         

mod1.log <- lm(Three.log$log.DFC_CLA~Three.log$AvgKeto20_atleast10 + Three.log$ad_Lactation)
summary(mod1.log)
plot(mod1.log)

mod2 <- lm(Three$DFC_CLA~Three$AvgKeto20_atleast10 + Three$ad_Lactation + Three$FarmNo)
summary(mod2)
plot(mod2)
```
